SERVICE.name: Sale
SERVICE.COMMENT: Point-Of-Sale is the implementation of the Sale Package Requirements.

LETTER.name: TimeoutComplete
LETTER.COMMENT: After CancelSaleStation has completed for a transaction timeout, this letter is mailed to exit the service

SITE.name: StartSale
SITE.COMMENT: This site checks to see if the system is configured as POS.

ROAD.name: SystemPOS
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when the system is configured as POS.

STATION.name: InitStation
STATION.COMMENT: Login Cashier, check access and get cashiers open till

ROAD.name: InitRegisterTimeout
ROAD.COMMENT: Timeout of Service

ROAD.name: ValidationCancelLayawayTransaction
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when the Modify Transaction service returns with a Cancel letter.

ROAD.name: UndoDemographics
ROAD.COMMENT: Leaves the service

SITE.name: ShowSaleScreen
SITE.COMMENT: This site displays the SELL_ITEM screen.

AISLE.name: ItemNumberEntered
AISLE.COMMENT: This aisle is traveled when an item number has been entered and is not empty.

AISLE.name: HideOnScreenKeyboard
AISLE.COMMENT: This aisle hides the on screen keyboard if the trans has just started.

AISLE.name: ConfirmItemScreen
AISLE.COMMENT: This aisle shows an confirmation message , when entered number is found for Item and suspended transaction both .

AISLE.name: ItemNumberConfirmed
AISLE.COMMENT: This aisle is traveled when user confirmed he entered an Item number.

ROAD.name: TransactionIDEntered
ROAD.COMMENT: Aisle for pulling entered transaction ID from input area. A Success letter is generated.

ROAD.name: TransactionIDEntered
ROAD.COMMENT: Aisle for pulling entered transaction ID from input area. A Success letter is generated.

ROAD.name: ClearSelected
ROAD.COMMENT: This aisle is traversed when the user presses the Clear key from the SELL_ITEM screen. The system will check for send item before delete

ROAD.name: ValidItemNumberEntered
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when the item number entered has been validated.

ROAD.name: TenderSelected
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when the user presses the Tender key.

ROAD.name: ModifyTransactionSelected
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when the user presses the Transaction key.

ROAD.name: CustomerSelected
ROAD.COMMENT: Road to traverse when the user presses the Customer button.

ROAD.name: ReturnSelected
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traversed when the user selects Return off the menu.

ROAD.name: UndoSelected
ROAD.COMMENT: Leaves the service

ROAD.name: NoSaleSelected
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when the user presses the No Sale key.

ROAD.name: SaleScreenError
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when an error is encountered during sale time.

ROAD.name: PricingSelected
ROAD.COMMENT: This road travels to the pricing station after the user has selected pricing.

ROAD.name: CancelSale
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when the user presses the Cancel key from the SELL_ITEM screen.

ROAD.name: UpdateShippingSelected
ROAD.COMMENT: This aisle is traversed when pass from CheckForSend

ROAD.name: FailureDeleteSend
ROAD.COMMENT: Not allow to delete items from multiple sends.

ROAD.name: UpdateShippingSelected
ROAD.COMMENT: This aisle is traversed when pass from CheckForSend

ROAD.name: DeleteSelected
ROAD.COMMENT: No need to change shipping method if not send item, or remove all the items from a send.

ROAD.name: ChangeShippingMethodSelected
ROAD.COMMENT: need to change shipping method, if part of items in a send are deleted.

ROAD.name: DeleteShippingYes
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traversed when Yes selected from CheckForShipping

ROAD.name: DeleteShippingNo
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traversed when No selected from CheckForShipping

STATION.name: PricingStation
STATION.COMMENT: This station starts the pricing service

ROAD.name: PricingUndo
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traversed when escape has been pressed from the pricing options screen.

ROAD.name: PricingComplete
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when the pricing service is returns succesfully

ROAD.name: PricingUndone
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when the pricing service is undone.

ROAD.name: PricingCanceled
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when the pricing service is cancled.

ROAD.name: ContinuePriceAdjustment
ROAD.COMMENT: This road goes to the Show Sale Screen.

ROAD.name: FailurePriceAdjustment
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traversed in a Failure letter.

ROAD.name: ExitPriceAdjustment
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traversed in a Exit letter.

ROAD.name: OkLetterPriceAdjustment
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traversed in a Ok letter.

ROAD.name: SuccessPriceAdjustment
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traversed in a Success letter.

ROAD.name: ItemsFoundPriceAdjustment
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traversed in a ItemsFound letter.

ROAD.name: TransactionNotFoundPriceAdjustment
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traversed in a ReturnItem letter when no transaction is found.

ROAD.name: NoTransactionFoundPriceAdjustment
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traversed in a ReturnItem letter when no transaction is found.

ROAD.name: InvalidReadTransaction
ROAD.COMMENT: Transaction read is invalid for return such as house account payment transaction.

STATION.name: TillFunctionStation
STATION.COMMENT: This station is the transfer point for the till service.

AISLE.name: TillFunctionFailure
AISLE.COMMENT: This aisle is traversed to convert the current letter to cancel

AISLE.name: TillFunctionUndo
AISLE.COMMENT: This aisle is traversed to convert the current letter to cancel

ROAD.name: TillFunctionCancel
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when the Till Function service returns.

ROAD.name: TillFunctionSuccess
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when the Till Function service returns with a Success letter.

ROAD.name: TillFunctionLogoff
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when the Till Function service returns with a Logoff letter.

ROAD.name: TillFunctionsFailure
ROAD.COMMENT: This aisle is traversed to convert the current letter to cancel

STATION.name: CancelSaleStation
STATION.COMMENT: This station is the transfer point for the cancel sale service.

STATION.name: ReprintReceiptStation
STATION.COMMENT: This station is the transfer point for the reprint receipt.

ROAD.name: ReprintReceiptReturned
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when the Reprint Receipt service returns.

ROAD.name: CancelReprintReceipt
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when the Reprint Receipt service returns with a Cancel letter.

ROAD.name: UndoReprintReceipt
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when the Reprint Receipt service returns with an Undo letter.

ROAD.name: FailureReprintReceipt
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when the Reprint Receipt service returns with a Failure letter.

ROAD.name: SuccessReprintReceipt
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when the Reprint Receipt service returns with a Success letter.

STATION.name: NoSaleStation
STATION.COMMENT: This station is the launch point for the No Sale service.

ROAD.name: CancelNoSale
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when the No Sale service returns with a Cancel letter.

ROAD.name: FailureNoSale
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when the No Sale service returns with a Failure letter.

ROAD.name: UndoNoSale
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when the No Sale service returns with an Undo letter.

STATION.name: ModifyTransactionStation
STATION.COMMENT: This station is the launch point for the Modify Transaction service.

ROAD.name: ModifyTransactionReturnedFromTaxExemptNotAllowed
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when the Modify Transaction service returns due to the tax exempt not allowed.

ROAD.name: ModifyTransactionReturned
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when the Modify Transaction service returns.

ROAD.name: CancelModifyTransaction
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when the Modify Transaction service returns with a Cancel letter.

ROAD.name: UndoModifyTransaction
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when the Modify Transaction service returns with an Undo letter.

ROAD.name: UndoModifyTransactionForFulfillment
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when the Modify Transaction service returns with an Undo letter.

ROAD.name: CancelMenuModifyTransaction
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when the Modify Transaction service returns with an CancelMenu letter.

ROAD.name: CancelMenuModifyTransactionForFulfillment
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when the Modify Transaction service returns with an CancelMenu letter.

ROAD.name: FailureModifyTransaction
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when the Modify Transaction service returns with a Failure letter.

ROAD.name: SuccessModifyTransaction
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when the Modify Transaction service returns with a Success letter.

ROAD.name: SuccessModifyTransactionForFulfillment
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when the Modify Transaction service returns with a Success letter.

ROAD.name: LayawayExitFromModifyTransaction
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when the Modify Transaction service returns with a ExitLayaway letter.

ROAD.name: TransactionLevelSend
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when the Modify Item service returns with a Done letter from sendmain service.

ROAD.name: CancelSpecialOrderTransaction
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when the Modify Transaction service returns with a Cancel letter.

ROAD.name: ExitSpecialOrder
ROAD.COMMENT: Explicitly exit special order processing to ensure sale init occurs. This should occur whenever a tranaction occurs. This check for workstation accountability and will logout the operator if appropriate.

ROAD.name: BillPaymnentSuccessFull
ROAD.COMMENT: Bill Payment Successful

STATION.name: SuspendedTransactionStation
STATION.COMMENT: This station is the launch point for the Modify Transaction service.

ROAD.name: ModifyTransactionReturnedFromTaxExemptNotAllowed
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when the Modify Transaction service returns due to the tax exempt not allowed.

ROAD.name: ModifyTransactionReturned
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when the Modify Transaction service returns.

ROAD.name: FailureModifyTransaction
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when the Modify Transaction service returns with a Failure letter.

ROAD.name: SuccessModifyTransaction
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when the Modify Transaction service returns with a Success letter.

ROAD.name: TransactionLevelSend
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when the Modify Item service returns with a Done letter from sendmain service.

ROAD.name: BillPaymnentSuccessFull
ROAD.COMMENT: Bill Payment Successful

STATION.name: CustomerStation
STATION.COMMENT: Transfer control to customer services to execute Customer functionality.

ROAD.name: CustomerContinue
ROAD.COMMENT: Road to traverse when the Customer service runs to completion.

ROAD.name: CustomerUndo
ROAD.COMMENT: Road to traverse when the user backs out of the Customer service.

ROAD.name: CustomerCancel
ROAD.COMMENT: Road to traverse when the user Cancels out of the Customer service.

ROAD.name: CustomerLink
ROAD.COMMENT: Road to traverse when the user link of the Customer service.

ROAD.name: CustomerOffline
ROAD.COMMENT: Road to traverse when the user Customer service is offline

STATION.name: SerializedItemStation
STATION.COMMENT: This service prompts the user for serial number input and sets the serial number attribute for one or more line items.

STATION.name: ModifyItemStation
STATION.COMMENT: This station is the launch point for the Modify Item service.

ROAD.name: UndoModifyItem
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when the Modify Item service returns with an Undo letter.

ROAD.name: ClearModifyItem
ROAD.COMMENT: Use this road to respond to the Clear key and return to the ShowSaleScreen site. returns with an Undo letter.

ROAD.name: ModifyItemReturned
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when the Modify Item service returns normally. This road rewinds the tape since a constant repetition of ModifiedItemSelected road then ModifyItemReturned road will result in memory leak in the Tape.

ROAD.name: CancelModifyItem
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when the Modify Item service returns with a Cancel letter.

ROAD.name: CancelModifyItemTransaction
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when the Modify Item service returns with a Cancel letter and there is a transaction that should be canceled.

ROAD.name: FailureModifyItem
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when the Modify Item service returns with a Failure letter.

ROAD.name: ModifyItemOk
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when the Modify Item service returns with an Ok letter from an error dialog screen.

ROAD.name: ModifyItemContinue
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when the Modify Item service returns with a Continue letter from sendmain service.

ROAD.name: ModifyItemSendDone
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when the Modify Item service returns with a Done letter from sendmain service.

ROAD.name: ModifyItemSuccess
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when the Modify Item service returns with a Success letter from sendmain service.

STATION.name: ReturnStation
STATION.COMMENT: This station goes to the Return service.

ROAD.name: CancelReturnStation
ROAD.COMMENT: This road goes to create a new transaction.

ROAD.name: ContinueReturnStation
ROAD.COMMENT: This road goes to the Show Sale Screen.

ROAD.name: UndoReturnStation
ROAD.COMMENT: This road goes to the ShowSaleScreen.

ROAD.name: FailureReturnStation
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traversed in a Success letter.

ROAD.name: SuccessReturnStation
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traversed in a Success letter.

ROAD.name: TimeoutReturnStation
ROAD.COMMENT: This road goes to the ShowSaleScreen, after a return was timed out.

STATION.name: SpecialOrderStation
STATION.COMMENT: This station is the transfer point for the special order service.

AISLE.name: SpecialOrderFailure
AISLE.COMMENT: This aisle is traversed to convert the current letter to cancel

ROAD.name: SpecialOrderSuccess
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when the special order service returns with a Success letter.

ROAD.name: SpecialOrderUndo
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when the special order service returns with a Undo letter.

ROAD.name: SpecialOrderCancel
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when the Till Function service returns.

STATION.name: ItemLookupStation
STATION.COMMENT: Includes item lookup, checking if item is valid for transaction and adding item to transaction

ROAD.name: CancelItemLookup
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when the Reprint Receipt service returns with a Cancel letter.

ROAD.name: UndoItemLookup
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when the Reprint Receipt service returns with an Undo letter.

ROAD.name: ErrorFromUINLookup
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when the UIN Enetered does not return any items associated with it.

SITE.name: EnterItemInfo
SITE.COMMENT: This site displays the ITEM_NOT_FOUND form to allow the user to enter the required information for the item.

AISLE.name: ItemInfoEntered
AISLE.COMMENT: This aisle is traversed after the user entered the item information. It adds the item to the item list in the cargo.

ROAD.name: NewItemAdded
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when the new item information has been stored in the cargo.

ROAD.name: UndoItem
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when the user presses the Undo key in the ITEM_NOT_FOUND form.

ROAD.name: CancelEnterItem
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when the user presses the Cancel key from the EnterItemInfo screen.

AISLE.name: SpecialOrder
AISLE.COMMENT: Special order state active and item is not valid

STATION.name: DisplaySendMethodStation
STATION.COMMENT: This station goes to the display send method station for updating shipping method.

ROAD.name: DoneSelectedRoad
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traversed when a Done letter is received

STATION.name: RelatedItemStation
STATION.COMMENT: This station goes to the related item services to add all related items.

ROAD.name: ValidItemNumberEntered
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when the item number entered has been validated.

ROAD.name: ItemNumberEnteredError
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when an error is encountered during sale time.
